post_content:
Missing the big 4 and Demmitt and O'hara for completion.  Most of the HoFers are graded.  condition ranges from Poor to VG.  See front and back scans of the entire near set here:

Ask is $85K net to me for delivery outside New York.  "I'll take it" preempts any offers or negotiations.
